titleStmt.title: Perrot against the pope, or, A true copy of John Perrot the Quakers letter and challenge to the pope with His Holiness's answer thereto : and an account of the Quakers proceedings and entertainment at Rome.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed the 9th. day of the 4th. moneth called June,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
